data.text: @CityNewsVAN Another reason fines don’t do anything! Make them pay before getting anymore car insurance! Or, put them in jail every weekend!
@CityNewsVAN Why is ICBC involved in Covid tickets?

@ChrisKFilms @CityNewsVAN Collections?? 😂🤣

Unless you owe tens of thousands of dollars, collection agents have no teeth whatsoever, and can't do anything.

They hire these losers off the street, no education whatsoever needed!

All you have to do is tell them to fk off, and they run off crying! 🙄

@CityNewsVAN GOOD! 👍🙏

They should ALL go unpaid, and I suspect, almost all of them WILL go unpaid!

Easily thrown out of court, if they even make it that far, which most of them will not, imo!

Good luck, corrupt and bloated, dumpster fire ICBC, you'll need it! 💩🤡
@CityNewsVAN Nothing but a money grab. Wouldn’t expect anything else from our greedy govt and their ICBC henchmen
